org.apache.polygene.library.sql.generator.grammar.common

Interface SQLStatement

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AlterStatement, AlterTableStatement, DeleteBySearch, DeleteStatement, DropSchemaStatement, DropStatement, DropTableOrViewStatement, InsertStatement, PgSQLDropTableOrViewStatement, PgSQLInsertStatement, QueryExpression, SchemaDefinition, SchemaDefinitionStatement, SchemaManipulationStatement, SchemaStatement, TableDefinition, UpdateBySearch, UpdateStatement, ViewDefinition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlterTableStatementImpl, DeleteBySearchImpl, DropSchemaStatementImpl, DropStatementImpl, DropTableOrViewStatementImpl, InsertStatementImpl, PgSQLDropTableOrViewStatementImpl, PgSQLInsertStatementImpl, QueryExpressionImpl, SchemaDefinitionImpl, TableDefinitionImpl, UpdateBySearchImpl, ViewDefinitionImpl

    public interface SQLStatement
    A single SQL statement, which is to be sent to database.
    See Also:
    QueryExpression, DeleteStatement, UpdateStatement, InsertStatement
